A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I love how they give it a 90%\, but LESS than 1/2 of the people that have seen it liked it. The movie was pushing so much propaganda down our throats that I couldn't stand it. Plus the weak writing\, plot holes\, weakening of Luke\, and over powering EVERY female role\, and making every role of a man to either be evil or dumb. This movie was worse than Episode 1\, yeah I said it! I love Jar Jar more than this pile.
